title: Fact Check: AAP MP’s tweets on President Kovind not being invited for Ram Mandir bhoomi pujan misleading | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Aam Aadmi Party MP Sanjay Singh recently put out a series of tweets that President Kovind was not invited to the bhoomi pujan of the Ram Mandir at Ayodhya since he comes from a Dalit background.

He claimed that BJP wanted to keep Dalits out of Hindu Temples.

His tweets received 6,000 retweets and comments and 21,000+ likes. After Singh’s tweet, multiple users on Facebook and Twitter also posted similar information.

We fact checked the above claims and found them to be misleading. First, we checked Keshav Maurya’s official twitter account where he had tweeted pictures of himself from the ceremony, thus confirming that he was present during the bhoomi pujan ceremony.
